item.name: Get Cosmetics Of A Shopping Cart

item.description:
Mobile API Documentation (Pharmacy)

 Customer Error Codes List  
 Security Token Expired Exception Message ==> "CEC0"
 API Unhandled Exception Message ==> "CEC1"
 Database Failure Exception Message ==> "CEC2"
 Duplicate Customer Exception Message ==> "CEC3"
 Invalid Cosmetic ID Found Exception Message ==> "CEC4"
 Invalid Medicine ID Found Exception Message ==> "CEC5"
 No Cosmetics Availabe Exception Message ==> "CEC6"
 No Cosmetics In The Shopping Cart Exception Message ==> "CEC7"
 No Customers Matched ByP hone Exception Message ==> "CEC8"
 No Medicines Availabe Exception Message ==> "CEC9"
 No Medicines In The Shopping Cart Exception Message ==> "CEC10"
 No Orders Found Exception Message ==> "CEC11"
 No Orders Matched By Id Exception Message ==> "CEC12"
 No Shopping Carts Found Exception Message ==> "CEC13"
 Payment Gateway Failure Exception Message ==> "CEC14"
 Login Verification Failed Exception Message ==> "CEC15"
 Sms Verification Expired Exception Message ==> "CEC16"
 Sms Verification Failed Exception Message ==> "CEC17"

Desktop API Documentation (Pharmacy)

 Security Token Expired Exception Message ==> "PEC0"
